Summary: Driving in my car, witnessed a ufo.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 8:50pm, driving along Seaway avenue in muskegon michigan, when me and my girlfriend witnessed an object appear from overhead of us. The object was a very bright white light. i thought it was a plane due to the fact that it appeared to be moving in a straight line, but it was moving very fast so i took a closer look. It flew very fast in a straight line for about 5 seconds.Then got even brighter before taking a hard left and disappearing a second later. i immediately asked my girlfriend if she seen the object she freaked out and said "yea what was that". after that i knew that we had seen something phenomenally paranormal. i continued driving along, recalling the incident in my head and with my Girlfriend.
